grid_name: TRN Hydro Missile Mk4 SG Rack1-4 [V]
title: High velocity missile for air to air combat!
header: Tanren Engineering presents the latest in air to air missile technology, the Mk4 Hydrogen Missile.
setup: This is just the small grid rack.  For a blueprint containing the welders and doors, see [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2438024841]this link[/url].
These missiles use the LAMP and WHAM programs, a guide to which can be found [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2219526455]here[/url].
These missiles are named Missile 1 through Missile 4. It is easy to rename them, just change the name of the group in the terminal and run the command "setup" in all of the WHAM programmable blocks.
attribution: The design of the missiles and rack is based on the missiles found on the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2370612752]AC Sentinel Vehemence[/url].
